title: `TestBinaryLoggerRoundtrip` test fails when loggers are also passed to evaluation
body:
this test fails when loggers are also passed to evaluation, whilst I don't see any reason why it should.
Need to investigate the reason.

_Originally posted by @vlada-shubina in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/8327#discussion_r1082546132_
    
No need to triage this - I'll investigate and open new issue if needed.
